thread.title: 'You look beautiful!' Boyzlife's flirting with Lorraine Kelly and Jeremy Kyle impression leaves viewers in stitches - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: 'You look beautiful!' Boyzlife's flirting with Lorraine Kelly and Jeremy Kyle impression leaves viewers in stitches - Mirror Online

author: Hayley Minn
title: 'You look beautiful!' Boyzlife's flirting with Lorraine Kelly and Jeremy Kyle impression leaves viewers in stitches - Mirror Online
text:
'You look beautiful!' Boyzlife's flirting with Lorraine Kelly and Jeremy Kyle impression leaves viewers in stitches Keith Duffy and Brian McFadden were causing lots of mischief in their ITV daytime show interview Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Lorraine viewers were left in stitches at Keith Duffy and Brian McFadden on today’s show. 
Lorraine Kelly struggled to handle the former Boyzone star and ex-Westlife member, as she interviewed them about their new project Boyzlife. 
The two singers were mucking around from the beginning of the interview, as they pretended they were on the Jeremy Kyle Show. 
And it got even funnier when Lorraine showed old pictures of Brian and Keith when they were in their respective boy bands. Read More Boyzlife had Lorraine viewers in stitches (Photo: ITV) Keith Duffy was flirting with Lorraine (Photo: ITV) Brian McFadden was doing a Jeremy Kyle impression (Photo: ITV) 
They couldn’t stop laughing at their throwback snaps, and Keith - who Brian said “looked like a convict” - said: “My mother’s going to be disgusted with you, Lorraine! 
“There are so many pictures and you choose that one!” 
He then started flirting with Lorraine, saying: “You’re looking beautiful, Lorraine. 
“It’s younger, you’re getting!” Read More The boys were causing lots of mischief (Photo: ITV) Viewers loved it (Photo: ITV) 
Lorraine viewers were loving Brian and Keith’s mischievous behaviour. 
Taking to Twitter, one said: “Boyzlife on Lorraine are proper making me giggle this morning." 
Another added: “@ boyzlifetour @ ITVLorraine You two crack me up every time. Poor Lorraine doesn't know what's coming next." 
*Lorraine continues on ITV1 weekdays at 8.30am Like us on Facebook
